table.name: vtiger_bhsdnc
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsdnc` ( `bhsdncid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhsdnc_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsdncid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhsdnccf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsdnccf` ( `bhsdncid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsdncid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
